tool.name: GOST
tool.help:
Gene Ontology Semantic Tagger (GOST) =====================================
**What it does** Performs entity identification and semantic markup with detailed semantic categories in biomedical texts, using a set of over `200 semantic labels <http://ucrel.lancs.ac.uk/usas/semtags.txt>` as well as types from the `Gene Ontology <http://geneontology.org>`_ .
**Required annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
* A LIF document with a new view containing `SemanticRole <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/SemanticRole.html>`_ annotations
